prompts: Create a cute fire-type Pokemon that resembles a small fox with bright orange and yellow fur.
Imagine a playful Pokemon that loves to explore urban areas and gather around campfires.
Generate a vibrant character with large ears and a fluffy tail, perfect for a starter Pokemon.
Design a fox-like creature with a fiery personality that enjoys roaming the grasslands.
Show me a tiny Pokemon with a mix of yellow and red colors that can evolve into something majestic.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a small fire fox, with accents of orange and yellow on its body.
Give me a unique character that embodies the spirit of adventure and has a love for nature.
